title: Wanted* Looking for a HIGH-END Laptop
text:
> Hello People,  
>  
>  A friend of mine is looking for a nice high end laptop only thing is, he
dont like the looks of the Asus ROG etc laptops. He wants something which is
very powerful, with a nice screen, awesome graphics (gtx 1060 and up) i7 7th
gen or maybe 6th gen cpu, ssd, hard drive etc etc.  
>  
>  Please let me know what u have.  
>  
>  Item Wanted: High end Gaming laptop  
>  Packaging Essential: Definitely  
>  Desired Age: New or a few months old but should have a warranty!  
>  
>  Location: Pretoria  
>  Willing to accept a shipped item: yea  
>  Ballpark/Budget Amount: PM me pls. 15k +  
>  
>  
>  
>  Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
